Package comp3111.webscraper

Class HistogramDataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.HistogramDataHandler
  • public class HistogramDataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as the data handler for the distribution tab of web scraper.

      • getHistogramIncrement

        public double[] getHistogramIncrement()
        This function finds the values for the 10 width bins
        Returns:
        - a list of doubles that contain the 10 equal width bin values

      • comparePrices

        public boolean comparePrices​(Item p,
                             double currVal,
                             double prevVal)
        This function determines whether the given price is within the given price range
        Parameters:
        p - - the item
        currVal - - max value for price range
        prevVal - - min value for price range
        Returns:
        returns a boolean

      • getCount

        public long getCount​(double currVal,
                     double prevVal)
        This function counts the number of items whose price falls under the given range
        Parameters:
        currVal - - The maximum price for the item (item price has to be less than this value)
        prevVal - - The minimum price for the item (item price has to be greater or equal to this value)
        Returns:
        - return a long value of the number of items that fall between the given range

      • filterText

        public java.lang.String filterText​(double currVal,
                                   double prevVal)
        This function filters the results to only the given price range. Called when the user double-clicks on a bar in the histogram
        Parameters:
        currVal - - The maximum price for the item (item price has to be less than this value)
        prevVal - - The minimum price for the item (item price has to be greater or equal to this value)
        Returns:
        - returns a string of items within the range
